text: Moshimo shinja ga 2tsu ni wakarete arasoeba, ryosha no ma o chotei shi nasai. Moshi kare-ra no ippo ga taho ni taishite,(ippo-teki ni) muhona koto o surunaraba, muhomono ga arra no meirei ni tachikaeru made tatakai nasai. Daga kare-ra ga tachi kaettanaraba, seigi to kohei o mune to shite kare-ra no ma o chotei shi nasai. Hontoni arra wa koseina mono o aisa reru
